Abstract available when rows are expended:

```{r}
#| include: false

# libraries --------------------------------------------------------------------
library(reactable)

# data -------------------------------------------------------------------------
source(here::here("internal/computation_posters.R"), local = knitr::knit_global())

df <- posters |>
  dplyr::filter(day == "Poster Session 3") |>
  dplyr::select(Nb = nb, Title = title, Authors = authors, Abstract = abstract)
```

```{r}
reactable(
  df,
  pagination = FALSE,
  highlight = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  columns = list(
    Nb = colDef(maxWidth = 50),
    Title = colDef(minWidth = 400),
    Authors = colDef(minWidth = 200),
    Abstract = colDef(show = FALSE)
  ),
  details = function(index) {
    htmltools::div(
      htmltools::tags$p(paste(df[index, "Abstract"], collapse = "\n"))
    )
  }
  )
```
